analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#97-102)

DeckCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#473-492) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#490-491)

DeckCoinCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#443-446) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol#445)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0xcb7f070fda083e8e5f40559376c360f0709e985c.sol:
